title: Anyone here from Polk area?

content: Ft Polk, La. is where I am talking of. The DRMO is where different Federal agencies in the region turn in their surplus items. The FAA sponsors airports in the system so we can get needed surplus items before they go up for sale to the public.
reply: Ft Polk, La. is where I am talking of. The DRMO is where different Federal agencies in the region turn in their surplus items. The FAA sponsors airports in the system so we can get needed surplus items before they go up for sale to the public.

content: DRMO, Defence Reutilization and Marketing Office
